words.ex: He remained obdurate despite repeated appeals.

Several viewers found the content objectionable.
The staff were extremely obliging throughout our stay.
He made an oblique reference to the issue without naming it.
The explosion obliterated the entire structure.
He walked through the crowd oblivious to the noise.
His obnoxious behavior annoyed everyone.
The instructions were too obscure to follow.
His obsequious manner made him seem insincere.
She is highly observant and notices even small details.
Many old devices became obsolete after the update.
He remained obstinate despite all the evidence.
Parked cars obstructed the emergency exit.
The advertisement was too obtrusive for most users.
He pretended to be obtuse to avoid answering.
The new system obviates the need for manual checks.
A blood clot can occlude the artery.
The dictator was known for his odious crimes.
He gave an offhand remark that sounded rude.
Dark clouds created an ominous atmosphere.
The report contained a serious omission.
In mythology, gods are often portrayed as omnipotent.
The novel is narrated by an omniscient storyteller.

The onset of winter brought heavy snow.
The onus is on the applicant to provide accurate information.
The legal text was so opaque that few understood it.
It was an opportune moment to launch the product.
The regime continued to oppress minority groups.

The system works optimally under stable conditions.
They lived in an opulent mansion overlooking the sea.
Surviving the storm was a terrifying ordeal.
The city passed an ordinance banning fireworks.
The team’s collaboration felt organic and effortless.
The palace was filled with ornate decorations.
He follows a very orthodox interpretation of the rules.
Public opinion tends to oscillate over time.

They made their goals clear from the outset.

The amount of work began to overwhelm the team.
